explanation: [0-0] A little girl wearing a colorful helmet and white protective gear, dressed in a pink top, stands on a skateboard on the yellow steps of a skate park. The background shows the evening sky with green trees planted outside the skate park buildings in the distance.
[0-2] The girl in the pink top spreads her arms to maintain balance as she carefully maneuvers the skateboard down the first yellow step.
[0-2] The girl in the pink top spreads her arms to maintain balance as she carefully maneuvers the skateboard down the first yellow step.

[2-10] The camera pans right as the girl in the pink top successfully skates down the steps, standing steadily on the skateboard. She opens her mouth wide in happiness and raises her hands before placing them on her chest to celebrate her success. Throughout, she keeps looking at the camera while continuing to skate.
